name: Batering Bones
description:
Bartering Bones is a 3D action TD-style game. The objective is to rack up as many kills as possible! Defend yourself from hordes of enemies, but be weary! When you roll a dice, not only do you receive points, but more enemies spawn! Good luck and have fun!


CONTROLS:

LMB to shoot

MOUSE to move camera

CODE:

Gabe Kotton – Streamed on twitch: https://twitch.tv/flamingoezpz (All 21 hours of footage lol) 

Bilal A.G.
